```py
numpy.nanmax(a, axis=None, out=None, keepdims=<no value>, initial=<no value>, where=<no value>)
```

```py
>>> a = np.array([[1, 2], [3, np.nan]])
>>> np.nanmax(a)
3.0
>>> np.nanmax(a, axis=0)
array([3.,  2.])
>>> np.nanmax(a, axis=1)
array([2.,  3.]) 
```

```py
>>> np.nanmax([1, 2, np.nan, np.NINF])
2.0
>>> np.nanmax([1, 2, np.nan, np.inf])
inf 
```
